importantArticles.headline: AT&T (NYSE: T) shareholders have plenty to celebrate, with the stock up 24% thus far in 2025.  As such, AT&T has emerged as a reliable source of stability amid the broader stock market volatility that's causing concern about the strength of the U.S. economy.  Can AT&T's record-setting rally continue, or is it time to hang up the phone?
importantArticles.title: Where Will AT&T Stock Be in 1 Year?
